name: create_temp
description:
Creates a temporary file or directory in a predefined location for storing LLM-generated content.
Always use this function when a temporary file or directory is required, instead of creating it manually.

desc.description: Required. A short description of the purpose of this temporary file or directory.

name.description: Required. The exact name of the file or directory to be created in the predefined location.

is_directory.description: Required. Set to true to create a directory, or false to create a file.
